item.title: Mitch McConnell Is The Personification Of America In Decline
item.description: McConnell has spent his career selling America's domestic interests down the river in favor of funding foreign conflict.

item.title: ABC’s $15 Million Settlement Caps Off Another Bad Election Year For The Legacy Network
item.description: From a blatantly biased presidential debate to a $15 million settlement, the network took a wrecking ball to its credibility in 2024.

item.title: Watch CNN, MSNBC Repeatedly Air The Same Defamatory Phrase That Cost ABC $15 Million
item.description: Here are eight times talking heads on CNN and MSNBC falsely claimed Donald Trump had been held 'liable for rape.'
